title: Take your main, switch their Q with their R.
body:
On a scale of 1 to 10 (1 being unchanged and 10 having a 100% ban rate) how broken is your main?

######For clarity, switching the abilities means that you can put a point into your R at level 1 and can only get your Q at level 6. Additionally, the cooldowns and mana/energy/rage/whatever costs are switched. Also, Udyr and Karma are not allowed into this contest, if you main either of them, just pick your _second_ main.

---

As with any of these games, maker of the post goes first.

{{champion:78}} **8**: You can't really farm when you're out of lane _all the time_.
